Html: hi radioman please tell me about serverandcache mode,what does it actually. i have another problem i am using your gmap.net windows form dll. there is a option of cache status that show how much tiles are remaining to save in local cache in a textbox also on progressbar in gmap.net demo. but i am unable to get it,i am using same dll what is problem please help me
it means what it means, uses tile source from server and cache

Hello Radioman,

Please, I have question I have to concept a application which use google map, but this application must work always offline.

Is it possible that google map work only offline?

thanks
yes, if you prefetch the area you want before using it

Where is it stored in the application or the computer? and is it possible to prefetch many countries?
if you have the space needed and time ;}

I explain, I have to do an application which work only in offline, so the user won't have the possibility to prefetch the area which he needs, I must I must include this featuse and store all map myself.

 

Could you give me a help and your opinion

thank you!

demos has integrated prefetcher, use it, you can import/export it, later in your 'real' app you can manually set map.CacheLocation to where the files actually is, maybe in your app directory or something...

when you import it, it's done and sql server is optional

import using 'my' demo ;}

thank you for your reply;

cache is shared across all apps that uses GMap.NET
when I import in your Demo,  it works and my app not ;(

well demo imports into default cache, if you changed cache location manually, it use two different databases, use default
